attributes.action: Stop MoD selling Stonehouse Barracks Plymouth due to historic importance.
attributes.additional_details:
Information taken from:
Stonehouse Peninsula Conservation Area appraisal & management plan.
attributes.background: Historic Barracks includes: Long Room of 1756, barrack blocks, officers’ mess, guardhouse, chapel, theatre, drill bty, 18th Cent parade ground, Prince of Wales Redoubt (1849), Eastern Kings Bty & 19th Cent dock. All listed Grade II or II* shows the area’s former/current military connections.
